attributes.action: pip breast implants help for all british victims
attributes.additional_details: we demand that the goverment urgently acknowledges the serious risks to health for women implanted with the pip implants and where they are still practicing,orders private clinics to remove and replace (if required by the patient)all pip breast implants without cost to the patient.women across the country are sick and disfigured as a result of these breast implants.urgent action is required to treat all women affected before any further damage to health can occur.
